item.title: My Aeropress Technique
item.description: What Youâ€™ll Need Aeropress Coffee Grinder Freshly Roasted Coffee (ideally < 1 month old, no more than 6 weeks) Hot Water Brewing Styles I like to brew my coffee in two ways: Hot Aeropress Coffee Iced Aeropress Coffee Both use the Inverted Aeropress Method, but the difference lies in the amount of water and whether ice is added. ðŸ”¥ Hot Aeropress Coffee Coffee: 12.5g, freshly ground (light â†’ medium roast) Water: Boil, then let it rest for ~1 min before use Steps Invert the Aeropress.
